result.name: SNP matrix of 8,953 pepper (Capsicum spp.) accessions from worldwide genebanks
result.description: By combining single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) based data and passport information, we investigated the genomic diversity and population structure of wild and domesticated peppers, tracing back to routes of evolution and providing a model of Capsicum annuum distribution, which reflects human trade and historical/cultural influences.
result.center: IPK Gatersleben - Leibniz Institute of Plant Genetics and Crop Plant Research
